lines.text: Do you always look this good in the morning?
You will have time to compare; there will be thousands of mornings.
If you're so difficult now, Mr. Brittain, how can we ever become friends?
I can think of *a hundred* better ways to die!
[Mark Brittain is getting ready for a deep-sea dive]
[Vic Rossiter mis-pronounces the word "lieutenant" while posing as an officer in the Royal Navy]

[puzzled, and then smiles]
You're *Canadian*, aren't you?

[pleased]
Why, *yes*! I'm surprised you could still tell- I've been with the Royal Navy for almost 4 years, now.
